member.name: KERB_PROFILE_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: The KERB_PROFILE_BUFFER_TYPE enumeration lists the type of logon profile returned.

member.name: KERB_PROFILE_BUFFER_TYPE.KerbInteractiveProfile
member.summary: The buffer contains information about an interactive logon session.

member.name: KERB_PROFILE_BUFFER_TYPE.KerbTicketProfile
member.summary: The buffer contains information about a Kerberos logon session.
